overview:
Kristin Snow is the founder of The Snow Group, and has over 25 years of communications, project management, marketing, people management and consulting experience. Kristin’s specialty is healthcare technology marketing.

Her background includes 15 years of running WFH, Inc. a communications consulting firm that focused on process analysis and reengineering of communications departments and deliverables.

This was followed by 10 years at GHX, leading a marketing and education programs team to success through team reorganization and alignment, process development, project management and creative communications development and leadership. During this time, Kristin significantly contributed to moving GHX from a start-up company to the leading SaaS organization in healthcare supply chain technology.

She now works with multiple healthcare technology firms on their marketing, as well as with a variety of local businesses.

Kristin received her Master’s Degree at the University of Denver in English, with Emphasis in Writing, and her Bachelor’s Degree from Lafayette College in English Literature. She also holds certificates in Publishing and Knowledge Management.
